title: Business Entertainment and the TCJA
content: Congress recently passed the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act (TCJA). Most people also know that the TCJA was the biggest tax overhaul in about 40 years. Some provisions of the TCJA were very favorable to businesses and others were not. For small business owners, it is important to understand how the TCJA affects you and […]  The post Business Entertainment and the TCJA appeared first on Law 4 Small Business, P.C.
